product_name: Patagonia Capilene 4 Expedition Weight Crew Long Underwear Shirt - Men's
long_description: The warmest and most breathable base layer in the Patagonia Capilene family, the Capilene 4 Expedition Weight Crew long underwear shirt keeps you dry and comfortable in cold weather. Capilene 4 Expedition Weight Crew long underwear shirt has a soft, stretchy feel, with a smooth face that glides beneath layers. Open-grid brushed fleece interior warms your core, wicks moisture and is smooth against your skin. Polygiene(R) permanent odor control resists odors so you can breathe easy after a long day of activity. Designed to be long enough to tuck into pants, the droptail hem stays put under a harness. Details include articulated, offset-seamed sleeves for complete shoulder mobility and hidden thumb loops to ensure wrist coverage. Black color features recycled polyester content; all other colors feature 30% recycled content.
